TEXT.TITLE: S/P UPGRADES TEXAS AIR <TEX> UNIT'S CERTIFICATES
TEXT.BODY: Standard and Poor's Corp said it raised to B from CCC 268.9 mln dlrs of equipment trust certificates of Texas Air Corp's Eastern Air Lines Inc unit. S and P cited its new policy on rating secured airline debt with special protection under Section 1110 of the Bankruptcy Code. But the agency cautioned this did not reflect a change in the unit's underlying credit strength. The certificates and 225.9 mln dlrs of CC subordinated debt remain on S/P creditwatch with positive implications. Eastern lost 130.8 mln dlrs in 1986 because of competition and customer uncertainty over its future, S and P noted. Reuter
